title: Mahiyammahi
author: Mahiyammahi
content: First Bitcoin Trade was in 2010 , 2 Pizza for 10,000 BTC by Laszlo Hanyecz. I saw him some of pod cast , he don't wants to talk to that incident. How cheap was Bitcoin that time. In just 15 years Bitcoin currently Holding $85,500 (at the time of writing this post) price. By 1 BTC you may able to buy luxurious real estate some of your country, A Tesla Car, even you can stay 2 nights on Burj Al Araf. Everyone has  accepted bitcoin to worthy of a investment atleast those who know about bitcoin. So you're holding Bitcoin right now .What you wants to buy with your Bitcoin in future? Maybe fast forward  next 20 year later.You're not just buying blindly right. What your vision with Bitcoin after 20 year later

What your vision with Bitcoin after 20 year laterThe future is filled with many disabilities, if you have the money to invest and knows the importance of your investment then you don't need a prior target, whatever you get from investing can be utilized into something remarkable, our initial objective may be different from what it turns to be. Most people get the confidence of investing in Bitcoin for retirement purpose, some to extend wealth through their generations, while a few sums every vision into one, 20 years from now Bitcoin will be worth if not a million dollars per one, imagine holding too many portions of it, what you think to matter by then may not and the funds be used distinctively from what was thought of into a new sector.

comments.author: Wonder Work
comments.body: Quote from: Mahiyammahi on March 19, 2025, 08:50:10 PMWhat you wants to buy with your Bitcoin in future? Maybe fast forward  next 20 year later. You're not just buying blindly right. What your vision with Bitcoin after 20 year laterI have not appropriately planned what to do with BTC or what I want to buy in the future because our plans change every moment. According to DCA, I have a small investment in Bitcoin. I will HOLD the maximum amount through this investment, but I don't know how many years I can HOLD Bitcoin. I have not thought about what to do with this Bitcoin in the future because I am continuing to maintain DCA by maintaining the investment and indicating that I can earn a good amount of profit from this investment.However,As a demo, I will not lose Bitcoin in the future. I will try to HOLD some amount of Bitcoin with which I can do something later. If I continue to invest and get a good amount, I will try to fulfil something good in my daily life with it. After 20 years, the view of Bitcoin will be high from today. Since good things are expected from Bitcoin, investing in Bitcoin is the best way.

comments.author: pinggoki
comments.body: Quote from: Mahiyammahi on March 19, 2025, 08:50:10 PMYou're not just buying blindly right. What your vision with Bitcoin after 20 year laterIf bitcoin has a consistent financial growth in that span of time and I don't lose interest in investing in bitcoin, I would probably use the profit that I'm going to get in my hodling to buy myself an apartment building and if not, maybe a vacant lot where I can use to build an apartment or even lease to businesses, that's the ultimate passive income in my opinion although tenants tend to have a delay in rents, the money is still good especially if you also live in your own apartment, you pay the mortgage for the apartment building and you're making money or if that's not enough, my last resort would be using the profit as capital for business or another investment venture, anything to make more passive income is probably my goal.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: QuoteSo you're holding Bitcoin right now .What you wants to buy with your Bitcoin in future? Maybe fast forward  next 20 year later.You're not just buying blindly right. What your vision with Bitcoin after 20 year later Investing in housing is a good way to spend your money imo because there is no shortage to the need for shelter. There's also nothing wrong with continuing to hold though but it's also cool to have multiple streams of income and with the fact that there's volatility to worry about, it will be nice to have something to take your mind off your Bitcoin for a while. I see Bitcoin in 20 years time being the legal tender of some countries because with how countries like America are pushing to make a reserve out of it, who knows if others will want to lean into adding it as either their legal tender or to pair it with their fiat.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: Quote from: Mahiyammahi on March 19, 2025, 08:50:10 PMSo you're holding Bitcoin right now .What you wants to buy with your Bitcoin in future? Maybe fast forward  next 20 year later.I will buy a house and diversify some part into an investment that will give me daily income. I will keep the rest of my bitcoin in order for me to pass it on to my kids. However, I don't have much bitcoin in my possession yet. I believe that with my regular DCA approach and the zeal I have to accumulate more bitcoin overtime, I will have a good size of portfolio in 15 years time.

comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: Future is not known but we can assume that bitcoin will be a big part of it.It is human nature to be afraid of the unknown but the ones who are using it as an opportunity to invest will reap the profits. Just like the people who bought at two to three digit prices of bitcoin have made quite a profit at the last all time high.These are risks in life and we need to take some risks with traditional assets being a backup. New things will always take attention but they are not always good like what altcoins and other bullcrapcoins have been.

comments.author: Hewlet
comments.body: Quote from: Mahiyammahi on March 19, 2025, 08:50:10 PMSo you're holding Bitcoin right now .What you wants to buy with your Bitcoin in future? Maybe fast forward  next 20 year later.You're not just buying blindly right. What your vision with Bitcoin after 20 year laterrealities as this is one reason why we can't blame earlier bitcoin investors who sold a good fortune of their bitcoin holding for some pizzas because of their ignorance of what the future holds. like, past investors, we all have set a target where some of us hopes to sell once bitcoin gets to that mark. for some, once bitcoin gets to $150k, they had already planned to sell and for others, it might just be $200k. realistically, it will not take up to 8 years before bitcoin gets to that mark which means that a lot of us might still sell our holding pretty too soon. and then if in the next 20 years bitcoin gets to a million dollar, does that mean we should regret our action? 20 years from now is a long time, things might go positive for bitcoin or might not, bitcoin might go really high or might not.if I am able to keep holding my Bitcoin to the next 20 years and Bitcoin goes really high, I will use my proceed to set up a very huge multi-purpose tech/library hub which is what I have longed to put in place but I've since been hindered due to lack of good finance to implement the project as I desire.

comments.author: peter0425
comments.body: Quote from: Mahiyammahi on March 19, 2025, 08:50:10 PMSo you're holding Bitcoin right now .What you wants to buy with your Bitcoin in future? Maybe fast forward  next 20 year later.You're not just buying blindly right. What your vision with Bitcoin after 20 year laterI am not just asking myself what I want to buy with 1 bitcoin. I am envisioning how much bitcoins I can have and what are the things I can buy with the amount of bitcoins I will be able to acquire. The answer is a lot. I hope to afford nice land and be able to build a house there. I want to be able to buy multiple cars. I want to be able to grow a business. I want to be able to be comfortable enough for when emergencies happen. I am envisioning a lifestyle with bitcoin not just its price.

comments.author: Dave1
comments.body: Quote from: Mahiyammahi on March 19, 2025, 08:50:10 PMSo you're holding Bitcoin right now .What you wants to buy with your Bitcoin in future? Maybe fast forward  next 20 year later.You're not just buying blindly right. What your vision with Bitcoin after 20 year laterThere was one famous line that we hear recently, "When Lambo"?Perhaps when Bitcoin reaches the price of 1 Lambo, perhaps that could be the dream of others, to purchase their supercar with just their Bitcoin holdings. Seriously, though, I'm not really sure, only thing that I can think is that Bitcoin can give me generational wealth. At least me and my kids and my grand kids will have a good life because of my Bitcoin investments. So all we can do right now is to look at the bigger picture and then accumulate as much as we can.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Usually it is a good thing for a parent to bequeath some inheritance to the children and grandchildren, so bitcoin 20 years investment hodling is a good asset to give to the next generation, make sure to keep passphrase to your wallet in a document where it can be traced and you are good to go. The more you DCA on bitcoin the certainty of the guarantee of the future of those coming behind you because institutions are coming to hodl btc and the growth in more significant. Who knows how many million btc will be valued in 20 years. Laszlo Hanyecz didn't know how much it will be valued for in 15 years and he sold 10,000 in exchange of 2 pizza.

What your vision with Bitcoin after 20 year lateri've been keeping an eye on Bitcoin and man, it's wild how much it's taken off. I'm legit pumped about what's coming. Like in 20 years or so, i can picture myself using it to score a housem grab some cool luxury gear or even just pay for my morning coffee. I'm holding onto my Bitcoin like it's my stash of digital gold, something solid for the long run but I also think it might turn into real money we use every day. I'm not sure if it'll shoot up in price or just become super common but either way, I want to play it smart. For me, it's all about locking in some financial freedom and down the road. i've got this dream of tapping into everything Bitcoin could be. It feels big and I'm in it for the ride.

This Bitcoin era does not only start since 2025, it's a wrong message from OP.Bitcoin has gone through several years that are not easy in this volatile and uncertain industry and market since 2009, to build up a bullish and bright future. comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: Mahiyammahi on March 19, 2025, 08:50:10 PMFirst Bitcoin Trade was in 2010 , 2 Pizza for 10,000 BTC by Laszlo Hanyecz. I saw him some of pod cast , he don't wants to talk to that incident. How cheap was Bitcoin that time.Of course, he wouldn't want to talk about it as that will bring back bad feelings. Although I've read somewhere he was quoted to have said he didn't regret his action. I'm not convinced he doesn't. If it were like 100BTC, it would even be easy to let go. Not 100, not 1,000 but 10,000BTC. That's really huge. I know many will disagree with me on that because Bitcoin wasn't worth much then. Anyone trying to argue should know that I'm talking of the quantity, not the worth.QuoteSo you're holding Bitcoin right now .What you wants to buy with your Bitcoin in future? Maybe fast forward  next 20 year later.You're not just buying blindly right. What your vision with Bitcoin after 20 year laterSorry to express a divergent opinion, Bitcoin may likely have outlived its useful before the next 20 years from now. If we take for instance how saturated the market is now and the market not strongly pulling up as it did in the past, we're not sure this industry will still captivate people the way it's doing now in the next two decades.

comments.author: Text
comments.body: if I’m still holding Bitcoin 20 years from now I’d love to see it as more than just an investment. I picture a world where it’s a mainstream, decentralised financial system maybe even a foundation for GameFi ecosystems and metaverse economies I’m passionate about. Buying a dream home or travelling the world with BTC is everyone dream but the bigger vision? It’s about financial freedom and breaking away from traditional systems that limit people.

comments.author: Donneski
comments.body: Quote from: Frankolala on March 20, 2025, 07:57:01 AMQuote from: Mahiyammahi on March 19, 2025, 08:50:10 PMSo you're holding Bitcoin right now .What you wants to buy with your Bitcoin in future? Maybe fast forward  next 20 year later.20 years from now, the value of Bitcoin will likely be more than 10x of the current price so that'll be enough money for today's investors. Instead of being concerned on what I'll acquire with my Bitcoin in 20 years time, I'm more interested in investing as much as I can now and when I've made enough profit in the future, I can then decide on the buying things that are more economically demanding for myself and family. And in a case where I succeed to acquire my needs before then and settled the people around me, I'll prefer saving them for my generations to come instead of lavishing my saved assets on material things that I do not necessarily need at that time

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: I don't know, maybe I'll save bitcoin, but it's not that much of a priority probably. Because I'm not a rich person. Maybe I'll save a lot of bitcoin if I were a rich person, but if someone who is trying to move forward in life, I won't be able to save more than one bitcoin, I guess.Because its value now here in our country is really big. It can change my whole life to have that amount, actually. Maybe if I save, I'll just turn to other cryptocurrencies like Ethereum, Ada, Hbar, Algo, Bnb, and Pol. I'll focus more on these mentioned than bitcoin because the chances of me getting a profit from bitcoin are small, honestly speaking.
